Title: Apparently Dead
Writer: Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi, Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: With Brandy horrified by Ash's actions at her mother's funeral, Ruby tries to split them further apart by bringing an old face back from the dead. Pablo, Kelly and Dalton return to the cabin to find the Kandarian dagger.
